Data: Ricky Ponting has won the toss and Australia will bowl first. Ponting is happy with the formula they used during the last match in Hamilton and he sees that as the best way to win the game and the series. Amazingly, it's his fourth straight correct call with the toss.
Harris to McCullum, no run angled into the pads and McCullum missed out as it takes him on the front pad and rolls to square leg
Harris to McCullum, 1 wide angled into leg stump again and it carries on down leg and called wide
Harris to McCullum, 1 run full in at the pads and McCullum clips it to Bollinger at fine leg
Harris to Guptill, no run better channel from Harris and he draws Guptill forward into a defensive shot and he drops it just beside the stumps

Harris to Guptill, 5 runs back of a length in at Guptill's hip and he clips it behind square, he calls wait then yes and McCullum would've been short of his ground had the throw hit. The backing up isn't in place and it goes for four overthrows
Harris to McCullum, no run fuller this time and McCullum drives back to the bowler
Harris to McCullum, no run back of a length outside off and McCullum pushes off the outside half of the blade to point
Bollinger to Guptill, FOUR runs Bollinger goes full to test the swing and it's a half volley ouside off and Guptil cracks it through the covers for four
Bollinger to Guptill, no run full on leg and Guptill whips it to square leg
Bollinger to Guptill, no run good channel outside off and Guptill allows it through to the keeper
Bollinger to Guptill, no run back of a length and Guptill moves back and defends with soft hands to point
Bollinger to Guptill, no run fuller and wider of off stump again and Guptill shoulders' arms
Bollinger to Guptill, no run good channel from Bollinger again and Guptill is happy to let it go
Harris to McCullum, no run cracking delivery from Harris as he angles into off stump and then beats McCullum as it nips away from the bat
Harris to McCullum, no run identical again from Harris hitting the corridor of uncertainty and McCullum is beaten again
Harris to McCullum, no run back of a length closer to off stump and McCullum is back and defending back along the pitch
Harris to McCullum, no run good length outside off and McCullum tries to push into the off side but it takes the inside half of the bat and back along the pitch to the bowler
Harris to McCullum, no run back of a length of off and McCullum plays back and a touch too early and squirts it back to the bowler trying to play into the on side
Harris to McCullum, no run great channel again to finish and McCullum sees it clearly and plays with the fuller face of the bat into the off side field

Bollinger to Guptill, FOUR runs great delivery from Bollinger has Guptill hanging on the crease and playing away from his body, it takes the outside edge and flies through the vacant second slip region for four
Bollinger to Guptill, no run back of a length and Guptill plays strongly to short cover
Bollinger to Guptill, 3 runs full on leg stump and Guptill whips it through forward square leg in the air just past Hopes at square leg and they get three to the long boundary
Bollinger to McCullum, no run back of a length and outside off, McCullum chops it down into the ground and nearly back onto his stumps as we've already seen him do twice in the series
Bollinger to McCullum, FOUR runs around the wicket and just too short as McCullum pulls through square leg, beating Hopes in the deep who had just moved back to the fence
Bollinger to McCullum, 1 run back of a length and into McCullum's hip, he moves back and works it into the leg side for an easy single
Harris to McCullum, FOUR runs McCullum advances down the track and hammers it straight out of the middle through cover for four
Harris to McCullum, SIX runs Harris drops short and McCullum is back and pulling over the short boundary at fine leg for six into the construction site
Harris to McCullum, no run Harris is back into the channel and McCullum is back and across and playing into the off side with a straight bat
Harris to McCullum, no run back of a length on off and McCullum moves back and defends back along the pitch
Harris to McCullum, 3 runs Harris loses his line and angles into the pads and McCullum clips him through mid wicket for three
Harris to Guptill, no run good channel and Guptill defends with a slightly open face to cover
Bollinger to McCullum, (no ball) Bollinger oversteps and hits a good channel as McCullum pushes back to the bowler. Free-hit coming up...
Bollinger to McCullum, (no ball) SIX runs another foot fault from Bollinger and McCullum picks it up and deposits it over fine leg for six

Bollinger to McCullum, 1 run better length and McCullum tries to muscle it over the off side, he gets it high on the blade and Ponting takes the catch at mid off as they take the single from the free-hit
Bollinger to Guptill, no run good length and Guptill drives back at the bowler
Bollinger to Guptill, FOUR runs Bollinger provides Guptill with a juicy half volley and he pumps it over cover for four
Bollinger to Guptill, no run better length outside off and Guptill plays to short cover
Bollinger to Guptill, no run half volley on off stump and Guptill drives to mid off without the usual ping off the bat
Bollinger to Guptill, 1 run half volley on off stump and Guptill drives wide of Ponting at mid off for a quick single
Johnson to Guptill, 1 run full outside off stump and Guptill drives through the covers and Hussey tidies up to keep the scoring to one
Johnson to McCullum, FOUR runs full and wide again but McCullum makes him pay as he hits underneath the ball and over cover point for four
Johnson to McCullum, no run half volley just outside off and McCullum drives to Voges at backward point
Johnson to McCullum, no run Johnson hits his length and beats McCullum who pushes at it outside off, super delivery

Johnson to McCullum, no run shorter this time and McCullum moves back and tries to work it into the leg side but he gets a leading edge into the on side and it drops just in front of Johnson in his follow through
Johnson to McCullum, no run good length on off stump and McCullum is back and defending into the off side, taking one hand off the bat
Watson to Guptill, no run Watson immediately hits his length drawing Guptill forward and defending into the off side
Watson to Guptill, FOUR runs fuller this time and Guptill stands tall and drives strongly through extra cover for four, glorious from the man with two toes on one foot
Watson to Guptill, FOUR runs full and angled into leg stump and Guptill clips it over mid wicket for four runs, good stroke

Watson to Guptill, OUT Watson is full again and Guptill isn't totally in control of the drive, nonetheless he hits it pretty cleanly but just off the carpet and Ponting swoops at short cover and collects a good catch low down, big wicket for Australia
Watson to Taylor, no run good channel wide of off stump and Taylor allows it through to the keeper
Watson to Taylor, no run good length and Taylor moves forward and plays to point
Johnson to McCullum, no run back of a length and McCullum plays into the on side
Johnson to McCullum, no run good length, McCullum hops back and plays to mid on from the back foot
Johnson to McCullum, no run good corridor from Johnson and McCullum is back and leaving
Johnson to McCullum, 1 wide full and some genuine away swing to the right hander and McCullum watches it go by and it's called wide
Johnson to McCullum, no run back of a length and outside off and he pushes into the point region
Johnson to McCullum, no run fuller on middle stump and he punches firmly to mid on
Johnson to McCullum, no run great channel to finish from Johnson and McCullum allows it through to Haddin
Watson to Taylor, no run good channel and Taylor is happy to leave well outside off
Watson to Taylor, 1 run good length on middle and Taylor pushes into the leg side to get off the mark

Watson to McCullum, no run good length well outside off and McCullum plays and misses. It seems as though he's now ion two minds as to whether to play his natural game or not, knowing that the debutante Stewart is next in
Watson to McCullum, no run McCullum advances and Watson bowls a wide slower ball and he leaves it alone
Watson to McCullum, no run Watson bends his back and hits the wicket hard forcing McCullum into a back foot defensive stroke into the off side
Watson to McCullum, no run good length but full enough to bring McCullum forward and he defends to short cover
Johnson to Taylor, 1 wide Johnson errs on line and he strays down leg
Johnson to Taylor, no run fuller this time and Taylor drives and misses. Well bowled from Johnson as he gets the ball to shape away from Taylor

Johnson to Taylor, 5 wide great bumper from Johnson and Taylor just sways inside the line and it really takes off and flies over Haddin for four and it's called too high. Harsh decision going against Johnson there
Johnson to Taylor, no run fuller on leg stump and Taylor is beaten, it takes him on the front pad and there is a stifled appeal but it's given not out
Johnson to Taylor, no run fuller and Taylor drives into the on side
Johnson to Taylor, no run half volley outside off stump and he drive to mid off
Johnson to Taylor, 1 wide pitched up and far too wide of off stump
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run full and wide again and Taylor square drives to the off side sweeper
Johnson to McCullum, no run good channel to finish outside off stump and McCullum leaves it alone
Watson to Taylor, no run back of a length and Taylor plays into the off side
Watson to Taylor, no run half volley outside off and Taylor drives to Ponting at short cover
Watson to Taylor, no run back of a length and Taylor pushes back to the bowler
Watson to Taylor, no run good length again and Taylor plays from the crease into the off side
Watson to Taylor, no run half volley on middle and Taylor drives firmly to White at mid wicket
Watson to Taylor, no run back of a length and Taylor is nicely in behind it and defending into the off side. Taylor looks as though he really wants to get after it but Australia are doing a good job
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run good length but too straight and McCullum whips it to deep backward square
Johnson to Taylor, 1 leg bye Johnson misses his line again and it takes Taylor on the thigh and falls into the leg side
Johnson to McCullum, SIX runs short from Johnson and McCullum is into position early and pulls over deep square leg for half a dozen
Johnson to McCullum, no run better length and McCullum is in behind the line and playing to mid on
Johnson to McCullum, 1 run short and in at the body and McCullum fends off his rib cage from his right hand glove and into the leg side for an easy single
Johnson to Taylor, 1 run good length and it tails away from the right handed Taylor and takes the outside edge down to third man
Watson to Taylor, 1 leg bye good channel nips back and Taylor tries to square cut but misses, it takes him on the back pad but he's hit outside the line of off and Asad Rauf says not out
Watson to McCullum, no run back of a length and McCullum plays back down the pitch
Watson to McCullum, no run slower ball is shorter and wider and McCullum cuts backward of point but can't get enough on it to beat the point fieldsman
Watson to McCullum, 1 run Watson hits the deck hard and defends into the off side, Voges picks it up and hits at the bowlers end but it was a well judged run and McCullum is home safe
Watson to Taylor, 1 run slower ball and Taylor works it through the leg side to the sweeper

Watson to McCullum, SIX runs McCullum advances and seizes the moment by hammering a good length ball over cover to the short boundary for six. He hit that like a tracer bullet. Just so clean. He will need to bat for a long period today if New Zealand are to post a competitive score
Harris to Taylor, 1 run fullish length and Taylor drives sweetly to Ponting at mid off, he throws it towards the stumps but wide of Haddin and they get an overthrow to fine leg
Harris to McCullum, no run good length and McCullum plays a fraction too early and gets a leading edge into the off side
Harris to McCullum, 1 run back of a length and McCullum pushes into the gap at point to the sweeper
Harris to Taylor, no run good channel again from Harris and Taylor plays into the off side
Harris to Taylor, 1 run good length and Taylor plays with soft hands into the off side for a quick single
Harris to McCullum, no run bends his back again and McCullum pushes to Voges at point
Hopes to Taylor, no run slower ball to start from 'Catfish' Hopes and Taylor drives to point
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run full and outside off and Taylor square drives to deep point
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run good length and McCullum comes forward and pushes slightly uppishly through mid off to the man on the fence
Hopes to Taylor, 1 run back of a length and Taylor pushes to mid off and steals a quick single to the man on the 30m ring
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run good length and McCullum uses the width to guide it to third man
Hopes to Taylor, no run fuller on middle stump and driven back to the bowler. Let's have a drink
Harris to McCullum, 1 run good length on off stump and McCullum plays into the off side for an easy single
Harris to Taylor, 1 run Harris hits the corridor and Taylor moves back and defends off the outside half of the bat behind point for one
Harris to McCullum, no run cracking delivery beats McCullum outside off. It seems as though there's a bit in the track if you really bend your back as Harris does every ball
Harris to McCullum, 1 run too straight this time and McCullum clips it to fine leg to bring up his half-century well played
Harris to Taylor, 1 run drawn forward and played to mid off for a quick single, well run

Harris to McCullum, 1 leg bye angled towards leg stump and McCullum misses, it takes him on the pad and they take a run into the leg side. Harris is adamant it deserves a closer look but the umpire isn't interested
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run back of a length and cut to third man
Hopes to Taylor, FOUR runs slower ball is full and Taylor tries to make something out of nothing, hitting in the air just past cover for four
Hopes to Taylor, no run full on middle and worked into the leg side
Hopes to Taylor, no run back of a length, gets Taylor high on the blade as he looks to play through the off side
Hopes to Taylor, no run fuller again and Taylor drives to White at cover
Hopes to Taylor, no run pitched up and Taylor plays to Ponting at mid wicket
Hauritz to McCullum, no run tossed up on the yorker length and driven back to the bowler
Hauritz to McCullum, 1 run full on leg stump and whipped through the leg side to deep forward square leg
Hauritz to Taylor, no run fuller again and Taylor clips to mid wicket
Hauritz to Taylor, no run Taylor showing a lot of frustration here as he hits straight to cover
Hauritz to Taylor, 1 run Taylor uses softer hands this time and gets one into the off side
Hauritz to McCullum, 1 run flatter and cut to deep point
Hopes to McCullum, 2 runs shortish and it at the hip and clipped backward of square on the leg side for a couple to the sweeper. It was tight but well run
Hopes to McCullum, 3 wide angled down the leg side and Haddin misses the ball and removes the bails without the ball and they get a couple to fine leg
Hopes to McCullum, 2 leg byes too straight again and it takes McCullum on the hip and runs fine to fine leg
Hopes to McCullum, no run back of a length outside off and McCullum pushes into the off side
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run good length and McCullum plays it to third man
Hopes to Taylor, OUT full on leg stick and Taylor clips it from the middle of the bat out to deep square leg where Hussey moves quickly and takes a good diving catch low down
Hopes to McCullum, no run good length and played into the off side, McCullum calls yes then immediately no
Hauritz to Stewart, no run tossed up outside off and Stewart square drives to backward point
Hauritz to Stewart, no run slightly shorter this time and played to backward point again
Hauritz to Stewart, no run fuller and straighter and played back to the bowler
Hauritz to Stewart, 2 runs good length, spinning back into him and he pushes off the outside edge, just past the outstretched hand of first slip for a couple
Hauritz to Stewart, 1 leg bye straighter and he moves across his stumps and tries to play into the leg side, it takes him on the pad and runs down to fine leg
Hauritz to McCullum, no run tossed up on middle and McCullum defends into the leg side
Hopes to Stewart, 1 run good channel but just enough width to use the pace and play to third man
Hopes to McCullum, no run slower ball back of a length and McCullum pushes towards mid on but can't beat Ponting at mid wicket
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run back of a length and pushed back past the bowler to long on
Hopes to Stewart, 1 run too straight and whipped down to fine leg
Hopes to McCullum, 1 run short outside off and cut hard to deep point
Hopes to Stewart, no run back of a length, Stewart drives on the up but drags it to Ponting at mid wicket
Hauritz to McCullum, 1 run tossed up on middle and it's full enough to drive firmly to long on
Hauritz to Stewart, OUT Stewart comes down the track, looks to hit it straight down the ground in the air but drags it towards Watson at long on who takes the simplest of catches
Hauritz to McCullum, 1 run short and cut nicely to deep point
Hauritz to Styris, no run tossed up and defended into the off side
Hauritz to Styris, no run fuller and Styris drives to Ponting at mid wicket
Hauritz to Styris, no run shorter this time and Styris moves back and punches towards mid on but he can't beat Johnson wh hustles well from mid wicket to save the single
Bollinger to McCullum, no run good length adn McCullum pushes into the off side
Bollinger to McCullum, no run good length and McCullum is nicely in behind it and defending into the off side
Bollinger to McCullum, 1 run fuller from Bollinger and the slower ball has McCullum playing too early and hits in the air but just short of Johnson at mid off
Bollinger to Styris, no run back of a length angling across the right hander and Styris square drives to cover point
Bollinger to Styris, no run good length and Styris has found his timing immediately playing to cover point
Bollinger to Styris, no run back of a length on middle stump and Styris plays to mid on off the back foot
Hauritz to McCullum, no run full and driven to mid wicket
Hauritz to McCullum, no run better length and McCullum tries to play into the leg side with soft hands but can't find the gap
Hauritz to McCullum, OUT uses his feet and chips it straight to White at mid wicket. Poor dismissal as the pressure told and Australia are extremely happy to remove the dangerman
Hauritz to Vettori, 1 leg bye Vettori tries to sweep immediately and it hits him on the body and runs past Haddin on the off side
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run Styris gets the front foot down the track and laps it fine
Hauritz to Vettori, 1 run Hauritz comes wide on the crease and angles into the pads and Vettori plays through the leg side
Bollinger to Vettori, 1 run good length on off stump and Vettori still has enough width to guide it to third man
Bollinger to Styris, 1 run bac of a length in at the hip and Styris takes a quick single into the leg side
Bollinger to Vettori, 1 run good length and Vettori drives on the up from the outside half of the bat to third man
Bollinger to Styris, no run great length and Styris moves back and punches to mid off
Bollinger to Styris, no run Bollinger continues to bend his back and hits the bat hard as Styris is back and defending into the off side
Bollinger to Styris, no run great corridor again from Bollinger and Styris pushes off the back foot into the off side
Johnson to Vettori, 1 run Vettori shuffles across his stumps and clips a full ball outside off to fine leg
Johnson to Styris, 1 run good length and Styris plays nicely into the leg side to rotate the strike
Johnson to Vettori, no run full inswinging delivery and Vettori misses as he tries to play to leg, Johnson appeals but it's going well down leg
Johnson to Vettori, 1 leg bye full inswinger again and it takes Vettori on the pads and rolls into the leg side
Johnson to Styris, 1 run fullish on middle and Styris whips it through the leg side to the sweeper
Johnson to Vettori, 1 run good channel outside off and Vettori drives off the inside half of the bat to fine leg
Hopes to Vettori, 1 run walks across his stumps again and gets an inside edge onto his pad and takes a single into the leg side
Hopes to Styris, OUT Hopes hits a good fullish length and Styris plays a fraction early, it takes a leading edge and floats back to Hopes who takes a good catch low down in his follow through
Hopes to Hopkins, no run back of a length and it really flies through quickly and Hopkins is beaten outside off
Hopes to Hopkins, no run bumper from Hopes and Hopkins ducks underneath it
Hopes to Hopkins, no run good length draws Hopkins forward, he defends with bat and pad close together, Hopes appeals but there's too much doubt to give it out
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run fuller outside off and Hopkins pushes off the outside half of the blade past point for a single
Johnson to Hopkins, no run good length in at the body and Hopkins is tightly in behind it and playing into the leg side
Johnson to Hopkins, 1 run in at the body again but too straight and he whips it off his hip to fine leg
Johnson to Vettori, no run inswinging yorker and Vettori walks across his stumps and clips it to backward square
Johnson to Vettori, OUT full and swings into Vettori who stays on the crease and is trapped dea in front, no problems giving that out for umpire Baxter, that was very adjacent
Johnson to Franklin, no run Johnson bends his back and forces Franklin back immediately and defending into the off side
Johnson to Franklin, no run fuller this time and driven to mid off
Hopes to Hopkins, no run good length, Hopkins comes forward and plays to cover

Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run full and driven through the gap at point to the sweeper. New Zealand need a partnership here because in the last 10-15 overs they have folded faster than Superman on laundry day
Hopes to Franklin, 2 runs full outside off and Franklin drives firmly through the covers for a couple
Hopes to Franklin, 1 run better length this time and Franklin pushes through the covers to the sweeper
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run short and at the body and Hopkins plays it around the corner to fine leg
Hopes to Franklin, no run back of a length and Franklin stands tall and punches to mid wicket
Johnson to Hopkins, no run half volley on off and Hopkins plays nicely to mid off
Johnson to Hopkins, no run fuller again outside off and Hopkinds drives without any timing to mid off
Johnson to Hopkins, no run full again and wider of off stump and Hopkins drives but misses, well bowled
Johnson to Hopkins, 1 run pitched up again and Hopkins drives off the outside half of the bat to third man
Johnson to Franklin, no run bumper angled down leg but it's just close enough to Franklin not to be called wide
Johnson to Franklin, no run half volley crunched straight to mid off
Hopes to Hopkins, no run good length outside off and Hopkins pushes into the off side
Hopes to Hopkins, no run back of a length and played back to the bowler
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run good length draws Hopkins forward and he uses the pace to play to third man
Hopes to Franklin, no run fullish length and Franklin pushes his hands at the ball and plays to point
Hopes to Franklin, no run Hopes hits the wicket hard and Franklin is solid and punching to mid off
Hopes to Franklin, 1 run fraction too straight and Franklin works it through the leg side
Harris to Franklin, no run good length outside off and Franklin drives on the up to cover
Harris to Franklin, no run back of a length and Franklin drives off the inside edge back to the bowler
Harris to Franklin, no run full and driven sweetly to mid off
Harris to Franklin, no run good length and Franklin drags the drive into the leg side
Harris to Franklin, no run back of a length on off stump and Franklin plays back to the bowler
Harris to Franklin, 1 run good length to finish and Franklin moves back and punches through mid wicket for a single
Hopes to Franklin, no run angled into middle stump and clipped to mid wicket
Hopes to Franklin, no run good delivery angled back into middle stump, Franklin drives but misses and is taken high on the back leg
Hopes to Franklin, no run good channel and he beats Franklin outside off stump, great delivery
Hopes to Franklin, 1 run fuller this time and driven to long on
Hopes to Hopkins, no run this one really takes off and beats Hopkins, the bowler and keeper go up but there's no edge or deviation
Hopes to Hopkins, no run good length and Hopkins plays off the inside half of the bat to the on side
Hauritz to Franklin, no run tossed up on leg stump and played towards mid on but Hauritz moves quickly to field
Hauritz to Franklin, 1 run short into the pads and whipped through square leg
Hauritz to Hopkins, 2 runs tossed up and Hopkins uses his feet and drives strongly to Hussey at deep point and they have enough time to complete two
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run flatter and Hopkins punches off the back foot through point to the man on the fence
Hauritz to Franklin, 1 run quicker and angled down leg and Franklin rolls with it, playing to fine leg
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run good length outside off turning back into the batsman and he squeezes it into the off side for a quick single to short fine leg
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run back of a length and he uses the pace and plays to third man
Hopes to Franklin, 1 run good length and driven to mid off for a quick single
Hopes to Hopkins, no run good length again and Hopkins pushes back along the pitch
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 wide bumper from Hopes and it's too high and just down the leg side so called wide
Hopes to Hopkins, 1 run good length narrowing into off stump and Hopkins pushes through cover point to the sweeper
Hopes to Franklin, 1 leg bye angled into leg stick and Franklin misses, it takes him on the pad and they take a leg bye into the leg side
Hopes to Hopkins, no run Hopes bowls back of a length and Hopkins pushes into the off side but can't pick the gap
Hauritz to Franklin, 1 run tossed up on off and pushed into the off side for a single
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run tossed up outside off and this one bites, takes the inside edge of the bat and rolls into the leg side

Hauritz to Franklin, OUT Franklin goes down on one knee and tries to sweep a ball that is down the leg side, he gets a glove on it and drags it back onto the stumps. That is unlucky but when things aren't goin so well those things tend to go against you
Hauritz to Tuffey, 1 run full and swept through forward square leg for a single to the man in the deep
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run tossed up and driven to long on
Hauritz to Tuffey, no run nicely flighted and Tuffey defends back to the bowler
Watson to Hopkins, FOUR runs back of a length and Hopkins gets underneath it and ramps it over backward point for four
Watson to Hopkins, no run good length and Hopkins pushes to point
Watson to Hopkins, 1 run slightly fuller and straighter and Hopkins plays nicely into the leg side through mid wicket to the man on the rope
Watson to Tuffey, no run good length on middle and off and played into the off side

Watson to Tuffey, SIX runs back of a length from Watson and Tuffey sits back and pullspwerfully over id wicket for six! That is an amazing stroke from a decent length delivery. I think everyone at the ground is as surprised as me
Watson to Tuffey, 1 run fuller this time and Tuffey pushes into mid wicket to retain the strike
Hauritz to Tuffey, 1 run short and cut backward of point to the man on the fence
Hauritz to Hopkins, 1 run tossed up and driven through the off side to long off
Hauritz to Tuffey, 2 runs flatter again and Tuffey moves back and drvies off the back foot through cover for a couple to Hussey on the boundary
Hauritz to Tuffey, SIX runs fuller again from Hauritz, Tuffey goes down on one knee and sweeps over deep backward square for six
Hauritz to Tuffey, SIX runs shorter and flatter from Hauritz and Tuffey is seeing is so clearly he moves back and pulls over the same region for six more
Hauritz to Tuffey, SIX runs full and wide of off stump, Tuffey goes down on one knee and slog sweeps straight down the ground fro six more. That's three in a row for the big fella! Sensational stuff

Watson to Hopkins, OUT back of a length and Hopkins tries to play square into the off side but it takes the outside edge and through to Haddin. Crucial breakthrough as it's the first ball of the Batting Power Play
Watson to Bond, no run good length and Bond tries to play square into the off side with an open face and he misses
Watson to Bond, 1 run fullish and Bond plays into the leg side to get underway
Watson to Tuffey, no run yorker and Tuffey drives to cover
Watson to Tuffey, no run yorker dug out into the on side
Watson to Tuffey, FOUR runs low full toss and Tuffey clips him backward of square on the leg side for four, super stroke and great timing
Hauritz to Vettori, 1 run Vettori leans forward and sweeps from middle and off through the leg side to Hopes on the boundary at square leg
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run shortish and Styris moves back and cuts to short third man for a quick single
Hauritz to Vettori, 1 run good length outside off and he plays inside out through backward point to the sweeper Bollinger who does well with White to keep the scoring to one
Hauritz to Styris, 1 run pitched up and dips quickly but Styris plays nicely through square leg for a single
Hauritz to Vettori, no run flatter and Vettori cuts off the inside edge past Haddin into the leg side
Hauritz to Vettori, 1 run uses his feet this time and is half-defeated in flight as he drives back past the bowler
Hopes to Vettori, 1 run Vettori walks across his stumps and clips to fine leg
Hopes to Styris, 1 run full and driven to White at cover and he struggles to get a hand on it and misfields allowing a single
Hopes to Vettori, 1 run good length and Vettori waits for it and punches through the off side to the sweeper
Hopes to Styris, no run back of a length and Styris moves back and punches into the off side
Hopes to Styris, 1 run too straight and clipped to fine leg
Hopes to Vettori, 1 run short ball pulled ot to deep backward square, they look for two but aren't prepared to take any risks
Johnson to Bond, FOUR runs full outside off from Johnson and Bond pushes the bat at it, it comes off the middle and runs backward of point for four
Johnson to Bond, 1 run fullish length and he pushes through the off side to the man on the fence at point
Johnson to Tuffey, no run back of a length outside off and he plays and misses
Johnson to Tuffey, 1 run fullish length on middle and he works it through mid wicket for one
Johnson to Bond, 5 runs Bond pushes back into the leg side, Johson runs to retrieve it, he picks it up and throws at the non-strikers stumps but misses and goes for five
Johnson to Tuffey, no run good bumper and Tuffey tries to pull, gets it high on the blade, it loops into the leg side and Haddin can't quite make enough ground to get under the catch
Harris to Bond, SIX runs good length ball, Bond leans back and clubs it straight over the bowlers' head for half a dozen. What a stroke!
Harris to Bond, 1 run full on off and he pushes into the off side for an easy single with the men inside the circle back on the edge

Harris to Tuffey, OUT half volley and Tuffey cracks it back at Harris and he twists in his follow through to take a superb grab and Tuffey's cameo is over. That is a superb cacth from Harris, you just can't keep him out of the action, nor the wickets
Harris to Southee, 1 run goes for the yorker, just misses his length and Southee clips it through mid wicket to the man on the fence
Harris to Bond, 1 run yorker dug out to third man
Harris to Southee, no run short ball and Southee sees it early and pulls but he misses

Johnson to Bond, OUT pitched up on off stump, Bond tries to hit it over mid on but gets it low on the bat and Hauritz moves forward and takes a good catch at ground level and New Zealand are bowled out for the third consecutive match

7.40pm The players are on their way back out onto the field with Australia needing 200 to win from just 34 overs. Power Play 1 is 7 overs, Power Play 2 (bowling) is 4 overs and Power Play 3 (batting) is 3 overs long. Bond to begin to Watson
7.05pm With the amount of moisture in the outfield, the umpires have decided to have another look in 15 minutes time and with clear skies above, it should be positive news at that.

The clouds are clearing and it looks as though we are only a matter of time away from getting a start. The match will be reduced, however, it is not yet certain as to how many overs will be bowled this evening.
Being a rugby venue, the drainage here is very good and, as long as there is no more rain, we should see some more play within the next hour at the worst.
6.55pm The rain has stopped and the ground staff are out in the middle trying to dry the ground which is quite damp without having any areas of the ground clogged with surface water.

6.05pm It is still raining here and while it is not heavy it has been a consistent downpour. There is enough moisture out there to keep the players from the field for a time yet. If we are able to get play before 6.30pm there will be no loss of overs, however, from that time on we will be losing time and overs. I will keep
Welcome back. We have some bad news from Auckland as it has started to rain during the innings break. The covers are on the pitch and play will not start at the scheduled time.
Join us in 40 minutes when Australia chase 239 to win and to take the series. See you soon

Nathan Hauritz was the pick of the bowlers for the visitors, taking three for 46, with his only blip being hit for three consecutive sixes by Daryl Tuffey. Shane Watson continues to take crucial wickets at vital moments, dismissing Guptill just when New Zealand were starting to gain the upper hand and then Hopkins from the

New Zealand have collapsed from 120 for one to be 238 all out. Some soft dismissals were the cause, it must be said, however Australia were able to create enough pressure, especially from Hauritz at a crucial time. The crucial loss was McCullum for 61 off 75 balls just as he was looking to accumulate through the middle and
New Zealand take the Bowling Power Play
Bond to Watson, 1 wide Bond starts up fo New Zealand and there's a hint of inswing and he started it too straight and it goes down the leg side
Bond to Watson, no run good length from Bond and it hurries Watson up as he tries to guide it to third man, it seams back and hits the end of the handle
Bond to Watson, 1 leg bye a fraction shorter and Watson tries to pull but misses, it takes him on the body and rolls into the off side towards third man
Bond to Ponting, no run good length outside off and Ponting is back and leaving it alone, good carry through to the keeper
Bond to Ponting, no run he draws Ponting forward and he shows good intent, defending into the off side
Bond to Ponting, no run Bond gets this one to hoop back into Ponting and he makes an early decision to leave it alone and it flies past the off stump. The crowd are really up for this!
Southee to Watson, no run good start from Southee as he hits a good length, just full enough to drive and Watson crunches it to mid off on the up
Southee to Watson, no run better length this time and a fraction straighter has Watson defending solidly into the on side
Southee to Watson, 1 run Southee throws this one up there and it swings nicely away, taking the outside edge and racing away to third man
Southee to Ponting, 3 runs back of a length and Ponting moves back and punches through mid wicket for three, superb stroke
Southee to Watson, no run Southee hits a good length and shapes it away nicely, getting Watson to play but it beats the outside edge
Southee to Watson, 1 run full again from Southee and Watson tries to drive but it takes the inside edge and rolls out through square leg to the sweeper who comes in off the fence to collect
Bond to Watson, no run 146 kph, Bond charges in with the crowd behind him and hits a good channel and Watson leaves it alone outside off
Bond to Watson, no run this one is fuller and tails back into the right hander and Watson is solid in defence
Bond to Watson, FOUR runs good channel and Watson plays it nicely, defending off the face of the bat and it beats third man for four
Bond to Watson, no run back of a length and hitting the deck hard and Watson is happy to let it go through to the keeper
Bond to Watson, no run slightly fuller this time but still on a good length along the same channel outside off and Watson leaves it alone
Bond to Watson, no run good channel from Bond but he doesn't get Watson to play, as he leaves it through to the keeper once again, good batting
Southee to Ponting, FOUR runs fullish delivery and swinging away Ponting lunges forward and pushes through the covers for four, immaculate timing from the skipper
Southee to Ponting, no run back of a length and it beats Ponting on the inside of his bat just wide of off stump
Southee to Ponting, no run good length and Ponting moves back and punches to cover off the back foot
Southee to Ponting, no run impeccable length from Southee and Ponting lunges forward, with adrenaline pumping through his veins, and defends back to the bowler off the inside edge
Southee to Ponting, no run good length again, splices Ponting on the drive and he collects the ball on the off side

Southee to Ponting, FOUR runs Southee drops a fraction short and Ponting is onto it in a flash and pulling backward of square for four, classy stroke and you just can't afford to drop short to this man
Bond to Watson, no run good channel wide of off stump and Watson leaves it alone
Bond to Watson, no run full in length closer to off and Watson pushes into the off side field
Bond to Watson, 1 run good length and Watson plays nicely to third man
Bond to Ponting, no run good fullish length outside off and he pushes into the covers

Tuffey to Ponting, no run back of a length it nips back into him and beats the bat, hits him on the pads dead in front and the whole stadium goes up but Umpire Rauf says not out

Tuffey to Ponting, SIX runs Ponting advances and hits Tuffey straight back over his head for six. He didn't time it perfectly but he got it well enough to drop just over the rope. Tuffey must be finding this hard to handle after it looked as though he had him LBW just two overs back

Tuffey to Ponting, FOUR runs back of a length and Ponting pushes back and punches through the off side field for four, that is just outstanding batting from the Austalian captain. New Zealand being taught a lesson tonight. This is a batting master class

Bond to Hussey, 1 run good length angled across the left hander and he plays late off the front foot to Guptill at backward point who fields well but can't prevent the single

On behalf of the crew here at Cricinfo, this is Marc Ellison signing off. Bye for now, see you in two days time.

The fifth and final ODI is in Wellington on Saturday March 13 at 2pm local time, that's 1am GMT. Join us in a couple of days time as New Zealand look to salvage some pride, while Australia will look to finish the series in style.

Cam White is named Man of the Match and he's happy to see it through to the end for the second game in a row. His game plan is to hit long and straight and it's obviously working pretty well for him. It's his first Chappell-Hadlee series victory in New Zealand so he is a very happy man.
Ponting is rapt with the team effort and heaps praise on most of his players.

New Zealand captain Daniel Vettori is disappointed in both the batting and bowling. His batsmen didn't socre enough runs, being 120 for one before collapsing to be all out for 238, and his bowlers weren't consistent enough to create enough pressure.

Nathan Hauritz made the important breakthroughs, nabbing McCullum, Stewart and Franklin in a spell that squeezed the life out of the New Zealand innings. Watson, again, provided the crucial partnership-breaking wickets and finished with for two for 24.
McCullum struck the ball cleanly for 61 but he didn't receive enough support at the top of the innings to allow New Zealand to build a sunstantial score.
New Zealand simply did not score enough runs, once again, and the Duckworth/Lewis system actually gave them a greater chance of winning, unlike five days ago during the second ODI.
Cameron Whites deserves a lot of praise for bringing the game home with 50 not out and his amazing summer continues. Hussey and Voges played important innings too.
Ponting played a great innings under pressure and basically counter-attacked the New Zealand attack when Bond was fired up at the top of the innings, with 50 off just 35 deliveries.
Australia take the series 3-1 with one game remaining with another comprehensive win here in Auckland.
Australia won by 6 wickets (with 17 balls remaining) (D/L method)
Player of the match is Cameron White, AUS
